title: Ed Sheeran's 'Thinking Out Loud' is first song to hit 500 million streams on Spotify
text:
Published By: Mashable - Today 
Ed Sheeran has hit a new Spotify milestoneHis hit "Thinking Out Loud" is the first song to ever reach 500 million streams on the p...
